title: Cookies Policy

content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, smartphone, tablet) when you visit a website or use an application.
They allow the website to recognize your device and remember certain information to improve your experience.

items: Session cookies (deleted when you close your browser)
Persistent cookies (stored for a defined period)
